title: Installation Design and Layout
content: Equipment layout affects accessibility for operation, inspection, and maintenance. Valves, gauges, and controls must be reachable, visible, and logically arranged. Poor layout increases error rates, slows emergency response, and creates hazards. Apply ergonomic standards during designâ€”retrofits are costly.
